name: Colour Spring Shot
description:
Colour switching, wall bouncing, power up smashing 2D puzzle game. Colour Spring Shot is a casual mobile game that will drive you up the wall. The aim of the game is to pot the ball in the matching colour portal with only a certain amount of lives. Switching colours allows the ball to pass through the same coloured walls, seals portals and training your finger to god level. Collect power ups and coins to other power ups to aid your quest. With 999 levels and a random generation system, no one level is ever the same.

Are you up for the challenge?
